extension.name: S5 Map It with Google
extension.author: Shape 5

extension.description:
Choose between map mode or input mode for users to get directions to your site.
Visit us at: www.shape5.com

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

field.name: text
field.label: Introduction text
field.description: Get a Google API key here, this is needed for the maps module to function. Go to the following URL to get your key: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key#get-an-api-key

field.name: s5mapitver
field.label: Choose which version you want to display
field.description: Choosing version 2 will show a map, version 1 will show address input boxes with a map it buttons so users can then

field.name: s5miwidth
field.label: Map Width (Leave blank to enable responsive width)
field.description: Enter the map width in pixels you desire. If you desire to have the map work in responsive be sure to leave this field completely blank.

field.name: s5miheight
field.label: Map Height
field.description: Enter the map height in pixels you desire

field.name: zoomlev
field.label: Zoom Level
field.description: Enter a number for the default zoom level

field.name: s5mapcontrol
field.label: Enable Map Controls?
field.description: Choosing to enable or disable the map controls

field.name: s5mapscrollwheel
field.label: Mouse Scroll Wheel Navigation?
field.description: Choosing to enable or disable the scrolling of the mouse wheel. This prevents the map from zooming in and out when a user scrolls down the page.

field.name: s5mapcolorstyle
field.label: Choose the color style
field.description: Default will show Google's default map style, the others are custom color schemes

field.name: s5mapitimagemarker
field.label: Map Marker
field.description: Enter in an image name located in your /images folder if you desire to override the stock map marker that is included with this module.

field.name: getdirections
field.label: Text for get directions link
field.description: Enter the text you'd like to show in for the get directions link

field.name: gapi_key
field.label: Google API Key
field.description: Enter your Google API key here, this is needed for the maps module to function. Go to the following URL to get your key: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key#get-an-api-key
